metadata.title: CVE-2024-26651 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sr9800: Add check for usbnet_get_endpointsAdd check for usbnet_get_endpoints() and return the error if it failsin order to transfer the error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
